title: Viking Global's longtime head of trading is stepping down from the $55 billion asset manager
full_text:
Viking Global's longtime head of trading is stepping down from the $55 billion asset manager. Stuart Brown has worked at Viking for nearly two decades.. Andreas Halvorsen runs $55 billion Viking Global.Scott Olson/Getty Images
  • Stuart Brown is stepping down as head of trading at $55 billion hedge fund Viking Global.
